meanings.sent1: The rugose fabric felt bumpy to the touch.
meanings.sent2: Her rugose hands showed the signs of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The rugose paper crinkled loudly when crumpled.
meanings.sent4: The rugose road twisted like a wrinkled ribbon.
meanings.sent5: The rugose tree bark resembled a series of small hills.

meanings.definition: Having a rough or uneven surface
meanings.sent1: The rugose rock scraped against his skin.
meanings.sent2: The rugose table was not suitable for writing on.
meanings.sent3: The rugose sandpaper was surprisingly gentle on the wood.
meanings.sent4: The rugose terrain made walking difficult.
meanings.sent5: The rugose texture of the wall made it hard to clean.

meanings.sent1: The rugose elephant's skin provided natural protection.
meanings.sent2: The rugose pumpkin had a unique appearance.
meanings.sent3: The rugose blanket looked like a crumpled map.
meanings.sent4: The rugose mountain range towered in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The rugose sea creature camouflaged perfectly with the ocean floor.
